divs: Sighting DetailsI am a physician dropped off prescriptions. For a patient about 918pm were talking outside for five minutes when we noticed diamond shaped object about 10 oclock position it got brighter then Nwould vanish patient called teenage cousin out as we watched the object rotated to seemingly face us while getting larger as it seemed to slowly descend the teen ran in the house myself and my patient looked at it for a couple more seconds them decided to leave...i felt somewhat mesmerized by it and ut seemed to increase in intensity when you focused on it...i felt whatever knew we were observing it
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Gaithersburg
There were no other sightings in Gaithersburg on or around April 9th 2012
Summary: witnessed diamo d shaped object which would brighten then vanish motionless no noise then turned to face us slowly decend getting brighter and bigger
